message:
英文大意：Emily怀孕了！
原帖地址：http://www.reddit.com/r/pics/com ... nt_is_pretty_fresh/
感谢谷歌娘提供的标题翻译
今天想在这个据说是国外天涯的地方练习英文，无意间就看到了这个……这群老外是要闹哪样
我截取了最开头一部分大家看看吧
[–]Momochichi 540 分/分 2 hours ago
I saw this picture as "I screwed your wife and now she's pregnant with my baby! Congratulations!"

[–]WendellSchadenfreude 117 分/分 an hour ago
Yep. I'd so insist on a paternity test after seeing this.
To be sure, if Will is the father, I'd still want to keep the child. I'd just want to know.
(I'm white, so I might know even without a test. But you can never be too certain.)

[–]lowleveldata 37 分/分 an hour ago
idk but if I fucked your wife I'd avoid taking a picture with her

[–]redaemon 86 分/分 an hour ago
Yeah, but you're not Will Smith.

[–]KnaveofHeart [score hidden] an hour ago
You don't know that.

[–]reprise785 [score hidden] an hour ago
you just blew my mind

[–]Soulcold [score hidden] an hour ago
But.. who is Emily???

[–]Sane333 [score hidden] 54 minutes ago
Emily is Will Smith's wife. The woman in this picture is just some random woman, who wanted a photo with him.

[–]Faggotcytosis [score hidden] 57 minutes ago
But who was phone?!
简单翻译一下，肯定有不准的地方，见谅
我看这张图感觉就像“我拧了你的妻子现在她怀了我的孩子！恭喜！”

是的。我看到这个后会非常支持做亲子鉴定。我可以肯定，如果will是父亲我会保住孩子。我只是想知道！（我是白色的，所以即使没有测试我也可能会知道。但你不能对这太肯定。）

我不这么认为。但是如果我艹了你的妻子我不会在这发图片

是的，但你不是will smith

你不清楚

你只是让我大吃一惊

但是……谁是emily?

emily是will smitj的妻子，图片里的女人只是其她想和他一起照相的不知名的女人

但是，谁是手机！
title: 我朋友的宝宝公布是相当新鲜的。
